The Same by Alex G

Released: August 9, 2011

Genre: Indie Rock

I listened to this song on unreleased Alex G playlists on Soundcloud for a year or so until the album Race got an official streaming release in 2021. I was so happy. I remember I made an art piece inspired by this song and posted it to instagram. That's how you know a song is good haha. I love Alex's whiney voice proclaiming "I'm not the same". So special.

   

listen here
